ygData.subject: Re: The Battle Rages On
ygData.msgSnippet: Ready to post now! *cracks knuckles then wiggles fingers, setting them down on the keyboard and then typing as if playing the piano.* * Iron Raptor

Ready to post now!
*cracks knuckles then wiggles fingers, setting them down on the keyboard and 
then typing as if playing the piano.*




* Iron Raptor concintrated on finding the repair program, invisioning her 
headling body in her mind. The metal mending and binding, circuits 
connecting. All of it.
Thinking that if she thought about healing herself then the repair program 
would find itself so that she could activate it.
But no matter what she did ot how hard she thought, nothing happened.

Iron Raptor sighed in annoyance and opened her eyes, growling slightly.
Slag! Why didn't this body come with a manuel?!!
She kept her eyes on Nemisis and narrowed her eyes at him as he pointed for 
Scattershot to shot at her as he aimed. Still just laying there.

< What will it take to win this fight?> she thought to herself, but knew 
that Prowl would hear anyway.
There was already a gustalt and the Maximals were fighting like crazy.
What could they do?
It was so frustrating!

Iron Raptor's eyes suddenly focused on Nemisis as she saw his weapon power 
up to fire, flipping onto her feet and staggering backwards as the pot shots 
come raining down, dirt flying into the air.*
